General.Name: Bang Overseas Limited
General.Description: Bang Overseas Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and trades in textile and textile products in India and internationally. It offers men's formal and casual wear under the Thomas Scott, Italian Gold, Hammersmith, Bang & Scott, Bang Europa, and FCC brands. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.

2.Name: Ms. Vandana Brijgopal Bang
2.Title: GM of Design Division & Whole Time Director
